name: 18_merge_join_pp.json

date_dim.query: SELECT d_date_sk FROM tpc_ds.date_dim WHERE d_year=2000 ALLOW FILTERING;

spark_sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM web_sales c1 
INNER JOIN date_dim ON (c1.ws_sold_date_sk=d_date_sk)
INNER JOIN warehouse c2 ON (cast(c1.ws_warehouse_sk as FLOAT)=cast(c2.w_warehouse_sk as FLOAT));
